<!-- Start with Single Sign-On -->

      <script type="text/javascript" src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
      <script type="text/javascript">
      
      $(document).ready(function()
      {
        var messageid;
        <!-- Fetch the array of content matches. -->
        var matches = google.contentmatch.getContentMatches();
        
        <!-- Iterate through the array and display output for each match. -->
        for (var match in matches) {
          for (var key in matches[match]) {
            if(key == 'message_id')
                messageid = matches[match][key];
          }
        }
        
        $("<input id='storeprefbtn' type='submit' name='storeprefbtn' value='Store pref' />").appendTo("#myForm");
        
        $("<input id='getprefbtn' type='submit' name='getprefbtn' value='Get pref' />").appendTo("#myForm");
        
        $("<label id='msgid'></label>").appendTo("#myForm");
        
        //var domain = gadgets.util.getUrlParameters()['parent'].match(/.+\/a\/(.+)\/html/)[1];
        //$("#msgid").text(domain);
        
        $('#storeprefbtn').click(function(){
            alert("storeprefbtn");
            //var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
            //prefs.set("veli", "alabala");
            return false;
        });

        $('#getprefbtn').click(function(){
            var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
            var name = prefs.getString("name");
            alert(name);
            //$("#msgid").text(name);
            return false;
        });

        gadgets.window.adjustHeight(20);
      });
      
      </script>
      
      <form id="myForm">
      </form>
